data_table.description: Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: GTAA4
variable.description: Reason for non-collection of 2 hour blood sample? Q4 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTAA2
variable.description: Amount of glucola NOT consumed (mL). Q2 [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTAAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTAACY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTAA1AHM
variable.description: Time participant began drinking glucola. Q1a [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GTAA3AHM
variable.description: Time of 2 hour blood sample. Q3a [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Oral Glucose Tolerance Administration Form, exam 4]
